Bash("/c/Program Files/GitHub CLI/gh.exe" release create v0.8.18 releases/phantasia-client-v0.8.18.zip --title "v0.8.18" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Changes

### Combat Balance
- **Flee mechanic reworked**: Now accounts for level difference, boots \(speed bonus\), and buffs
- Flee chance hardcapped at 5-95% \(always a small chance to escape or fail\)
- Fighting monsters much higher level makes fleeing harder \(-3% per level above you\)

### Monster Ability Changes
- **Shield Bearer**: 35% chance to drop shield \(was 100%\)
- **Weapon Master**: 35% chance to drop weapon \(was 100%\)
- **Wish Granter**: 10% chance to grant wish \(was 100%\)
- Added failure messages when abilities don''t trigger

### Wish Rewards
- Replaced gold wish option with **Equipment Upgrade**
- Equipment upgrades scale with monster difficulty:
  - Base 1-2 upgrades
  - +1 per 500 lethality \(up to +5\)
  - +1 per 10 levels above player \(up to +5\)
  - Maximum possible: 12 upgrade levels from one wish!
EOF
\)")

Bash("/c/Program Files/GitHub CLI/gh.exe" release create v0.8.19 releases/phantasia-client-v0.8.19.zip --title "v0.8.19" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Changes

### Help Page Updates
- Updated flee formula to show accurate mechanics:
  - Base 50% + \(DEX × 2\) + equipment speed + buffs - \(level diff × 3\)
  - Hardcapped at 5-95%
- Added **Reward Abilities** section explaining drop chances:
  - Wish Granter: 10% chance
  - Weapon Master: 35% chance
  - Shield Bearer: 35% chance
  - Gem Bearer: Always drops extra gems
  - Gold Hoarder: 3x gold
- Added **Wish Rewards** section explaining equipment upgrade scaling

### Visual Improvements
- Darker client background \(black clear color instead of default gray\)
- Panel backgrounds now fully opaque for better contrast
EOF
\)")

Bash("/c/Program Files/GitHub CLI/gh.exe" release create v0.8.20 releases/phantasia-client-v0.8.20.zip --title "v0.8.20" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Mage Class Improvements

### Meditate Ability \(Replaces Rest for Mages\)
- Restores both HP **and** 15-25% max mana
- If already at full HP: **double mana regeneration** \(30-50%\)
- Works even at full HP for pure mana recovery
- Still has 15% ambush chance like Rest
- Action bar shows "Meditate" instead of "Rest"

### Magic Bolt Enhancement
- Now auto-suggests the exact mana amount to kill the monster
- Only works when monster HP is known \(via Analyze or damage dealt\)
- Shows enemy HP in the popup for convenience

### Mana Scaling Improvements
- New formula: INT×12 + WIS×6 \(was INT×8 + WIS×4\)
- Per level: +10 + INT mana \(was +5 + INT/2\)
- Mages now have 50% more mana capacity
- Makes Magic Bolt spam more viable while still requiring Meditate

### Visual
- Background slightly less dark \(very dark blue-gray instead of pure black\)

---

Example Mana Pools:
| Level | Old | New |
|-------|-----|-----|
| 1 \(12 INT, 10 WIS\) | 136 | 204 |
| 20 \(20 INT, 12 WIS\) | 208 | 312 |
| 50 \(30 INT, 15 WIS\) | 320 | 450 |
EOF
\)")

- Base success: 45% → 30%

- Armor defense/HP reduced proportionally

### XP Scaling \(NERFED\)
- Same-tier level difference bonus capped at +50%
- Monster base XP formula reduced significantly
- Fighting same-level monsters won''t give a full level anymore

### Bug Fixes
- Trophy system now allows collecting duplicates \(for leaderboards\)
- Resource potions fixed \(were restoring 0\)
- Added leaderboard reset functions

- **Home Stone \(Companion\)** - Registers active companion to kennel

- Unregister companions \(move from kennel to storage\)
- Register companions from storage to kennel
- Withdraw items when creating new character
- Checkout registered companions for new characters

- **Egg Freezing** - Pause hatching progress to save eggs for Home Stones
- **Companion Sorting** - Sort by level, tier, variant, damage, name, or type
